description.value:
Requirements You're in hybrid or animal shape.

You spring on an unsuspecting opponent, tearing at them with your teeth. You Stride up to 10 feet and make a jaws Strike at the end of that movement. If you began this action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden], you remain hidden until after this Strike. If you have a fly or swim Speed, you can Fly or Swim up to 10 feet instead of Stride

value.value: your animal shape grants a fangs or jaws unarmed attack
